text: i want us to be by each others side
title: text

text: Annette, I started this over a year ago.
title: text000

text: Do you remember I told you that you were every woman I've ever dated.
title: text000

text: I felt every woman had led me to you...
title: text000

text: Every experience... every dream... I felt as though I'd met you before...
title: text000

text: A year away from you and it still doesn't feel like our time is over to me.
title: text003

text: I am so very grateful for every second I had with you.
title: text004

text: I have fought moving on because I still feel you... the pain you struggle with daily, the stress you are under...
title: text005

text: I want to be the one by your side, through anything...
title: text005

text: I still remember the first day I saw you walk into India Palace...
title: text006

text: I couldn't believe that the woman I'd been listening to sing was in front of me...
title: text006

text: Talking with you was so much fun (it still is).
title: text006

text: I remember how beautiful you were when it started to snow...
title: text006

text: ...and how much I wanted to kiss you...
title: text006

text: I am so sorry about waiting but when I saw you later that night and I kissed you for the first time...
title: blank

text: it was perfect.  And it would have been worth any wait.
title: blank

text: Thank you for our time, thank you for helping me to see.
title: text007
